Title: Ji mi zhong an zhi zhi ming you huo
Actors: Mikie Ng Miu Yee, Fujimi Nadeki, Kwok Leung Cheung
Plot: Two nasty members of the Red Army hit Hong Kong. Icy is a seriously perverted young woman, while her partner is a multi-kicking cigar-chomping heavy metal fan. When Icy kills a drug dealer, the police investigate.
